## Page Header - **Date**: Lunes 10 de marzo del 2025 - **Source**: El Peruano, Política, 2 ## En Palacio de Gobierno ### Alcaldes se reúnen con el Ejecutivo Los alcaldes de la Mancomunidad de Municipalidades del Vraem (Amuvrae) y la Mancomunidad Municipal Amazónica de La Convención se reunirán en los próximos días con el Poder Ejecutivo para gestionar soluciones concretas en materia de infraestructura, salud, educación, transporte, agricultura y riego, energía y comercio exterior, entre otros sectores. #### Asistentes - Estas reuniones contarán con la presencia de los titulares de Energía y Minas, Desarrollo Agrario y Riego, Transportes, Vivienda, Salud y Educación. Con las autoridades locales a fin de atender las necesidades más urgentes de esta región. ## Text Content El legislador Luis Ángel Aragón (Acción Popular) gestionó estos encuentros donde las autoridades locales presentarán sus demandas prioritarias ante el Gobierno central. ## Text Content El parlamentario informó que las reuniones se realizarán hoy y mañana a las 16:00 horas en Palacio de Gobierno y que la presidente de la República, Dina Boluarte, aceptó el diálogo con las autoridades locales, a fin de atender las necesidades más urgentes de estas jurisdicciones. El primer encuentro se efectuará hoy con los alcaldes del Vraem (Valle de los ríos Apurímac, Ene y Mantaro), mientras que mañana será el turno de la Mancomunidad Municipal Amazónica de La Convención. En esta reunión se hará seguimiento a los compromisos asumidos en la mesa de trabajo efectuada el 30 de mayo del 2024. ## Asistentes - Estas reuniones contarán con la presencia de los titulares de Energía y Minas, Desarrollo Agrario y Riego, Transportes, Vivienda, Salud y Educación. ## Articulación Ejecutivo y alcaldes coordinan para atender demandas ## Description of the Figure The image is a series of photographs depicting a sequence of events involving a person and a large animal, likely a bear. The sequence is divided into several frames, each capturing a different moment in the interaction. ### Frame-by-Frame Description 1. **Frame 1**: - The setting is a forested area with dense foliage. - A person is standing near a large bear, which is on all fours. - The person appears to be holding something in their hand, possibly food or an object of interest to the bear. 2. **Frame 2**: - The bear is now standing on its hind legs, reaching towards the person. - The person is extending their arm towards the bear, maintaining eye contact. - The background remains consistent with the forest setting. 3. **Frame 3**: - The bear is closer to the person, still on its hind legs. - The person is slightly leaning back, possibly in response to the bear's approach. - The interaction appears calm, with no signs of aggression from the bear. 4. **Frame 4**: - The bear has returned to all fours, and the person is stepping back. - The person is looking at the bear, and the bear is looking back at the person. - The environment is unchanged, with trees and underbrush visible. 5. **Frame 5**: - The person is now further away from the bear, walking backwards. - The bear is stationary, watching the person. - The scene suggests the end of the interaction, with both parties disengaging. ### Contextual Notes - The sequence captures a peaceful interaction between a human and a bear, emphasizing mutual curiosity rather than aggression. - The setting in a natural forest environment suggests this is a wildlife observation or a controlled interaction. - The bear's behavior is calm and non-threatening throughout the sequence, indicating familiarity or habituation to human presence. This detailed description provides a comprehensive understanding of the sequence without needing to view the original images. ## Description The image shows a group of four men seated at a conference table, engaged in a meeting or discussion. They are all wearing collared shirts, with three in white and one in a light purple shirt. In front of them is a projector, suggesting a presentation or discussion involving visual aids. The setting appears to be a formal meeting room with wooden paneling and a high ceiling. There are microphones on the table, indicating that this might be a formal or recorded meeting. The expressions of the men suggest attentiveness and engagement in the discussion. In the background, there are additional people, but they are not the focus of the image. The overall atmosphere is professional and focused. ## Page Footer Details 1. **Page Number**: 3 2. **Checkboxes**: - [x] Checkbox 1 - [ ] Checkbox 2 - [x] Checkbox 3 - [ ] Checkbox 4 - [x] Checkbox 5 3. **Key-Value Pairs**: - Document ID: 12345 - Revision: A - Date: 2023-10-05 4. **Table**: ```html

The x-axis is labeled "Categories" and the y-axis is labeled "Values". The first bar is labeled "A" with a value of 10, the second bar is labeled "B" with a value of 20, and the third bar is labeled "C" with a value of 30.
